attributes.action: Add a speed camera or speed humps on Barry Road
attributes.additional_details: Speed cameras or speed bumps need to be installed on barry road for our safety! This is not the first time we’ve heard something like this, we are constantly constantly seeing people drive at crazy speeds up and down barry road.
attributes.background: Outside of our flat (Halliwell Court) window on 30/05/2021 we heard a huge crash a car had crashed into a row of cars resulting in several cars being severely damaged.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
